name: SpaceRobbers 2
description:
Legend tells of a terrifying alien queen, and you've just stolen her vault.

Race through space as you are relentlessly hunted by the alien force! The vault between you and your partner(yourself, trust no-one) must not be damaged as you have been paid top dollars for the contents!

The game is a topdown shooter where you control two spaceships at once with asymmetrical controls. Keep shooting down enemies as the screen quickly fills with enemy attacks. The only way to get damaged is by enemies or bullets hitting the vault swinging between the ships. Swinging the vault into your enemies deals massive damage and rewards you with a score multiplier! But watch aóut as it also damages it.

Credits:

Coding: Alexander Norgren, Martin Yxberg, Fox Hamrén and Adam Temmel

Art: Caronela and Fox Hamrén

Music and sound: Joel Skoglund and Adam Temmel

Special Thanks to Tom Francis and the Unity forums!
